      • isSystemEvent

        public boolean isSystemEvent()
        Description copied from interface: IMonitorEvent
        Determines if this is a low-level event that is part of the platform operation and which the application developer would not likely want to see. This is used in the monitor to filter events depending on the goals of the user.
        Specified by:
        isSystemEvent in interface IMonitorEvent
        Returns:
